thread.title: Evidence Reveals Paul Ryan Saying He Will Never Get Behind Donald Trump
thread.title_full: Evidence Reveals Paul Ryan Saying He Will Never Get Behind Donald Trump

author: John Falkenberg
title: Evidence Reveals Paul Ryan Saying He Will Never Get Behind Donald Trump

persons.name: rachel maddow over release of trump

text:
Donald Trump Jr. Slams Rachel Maddow Over Release of Trump’s Tax Return 
The big — and concerning — takeaway here is his statement that he would not defend Trump in the future. Ryan’s comments start about the 1:05 mark. 
“His comments are not anywhere in keeping with our party’s principles and values,” Ryan can be heard saying, concerning Trump’s leaked audio from 2005.   
He is, of course, correct to say so — Trump’s comments were inexcusable. However, Ryan takes things a big step too far very shortly thereafter. 
Here’s where things get ominous. 
“There are basically two things that I want to make really clear, as for myself as your speaker. I am not going to defend Donald Trump — not now, not in the future.” 
If he really means what he says here, then we are looking at a divided front in the face of the greatest Republican victory in a very long time.
